metadata.title: CVE-2017-16229 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Ox gem 2.8.1 for Ruby, the process crashes with a stack-based bufferover-read in the read_from_str function in sax_buf.c when a crafted inputis supplied to sax_parse.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16229` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-ox - 2.8.2-1build2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-ox package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.2-1build2').
